situation.title: Volunteer firefighters
situation.meta_description: Rules and recommendations for volunteer firefighters.

content.processed:
Rules and recommendations

Volunteer firefighters in normal operation must follow all emergency measures at the moment. Exceptions to free movement are activities designed to ensure security, internal order or crisis management. Typically, these are emergency trips to fires, floods or other disasters. When leaving firefighters must be equipped with protective equipment that is adapted to the type of intervention. During all activities it is also necessary, according to the situation, to pay maximum attention to hygienic measures.
